title: League Client Bugged?
body:
A game of mine was complete after losing with a team of full star guardians xd, and all that, but when my friend and I try to play a game it doesnt let us make draft or invasion only blind pick? So my friend and I restarted our clients and it just takes us back to the GAME????{{sticker:sg-lux-2}} plz help xd. (P.S) This happened at the same time i heard drilling outside my house and i was spooked af 

Sincerely-Your fellow snack, A Bagelle

replies.body: You might have been affected by the string of ghost games we had today. If you still can't get into another game, don't fret just yet. I know it's immensely frustrating, but we do have some guys working to try and get these ghost games to clear out. The only way to be able to requeue is to wait for these games to finally end =\ .

Tip: Remove the name of your friend from the post if you would i know the mods have a time with this sort of thing.

Also maybe there is a connection with normal games have Abnormally high latencey issues, atleast on the NA server since 4 P.M EST.

The friend's name is perfectly fine, it's when someone is "Naming & Shaming" where it becomes a problem. Simply saying someone else's Summoner name won't get you in trouble unless it's somewhat negative or hateful!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=eWEIhGUd,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-09-21T02:59:23.156+0000)

although i see his friends name perfectly fine, 80% of the community look at it as naming and shaming its just better to keep it them out of the boards or you are going to have people complaining why he can name and shame and no one else cannot.

may want to think it over some Broporo.

Was just letting you know, simply saying your name is perfectly fine here. No need to remove names unless you're picking on someone, in which case I'll just do it myself. Stating someone's name is perfectly fine depending on context.
